# GnuCashEngine.Initialize method

Initializes the GnuCash engine. This requires only once.

```csharp
public static void Initialize(string gnucashCli = "gnucash-cli")
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| gnucashCli | The path to gnucash-cli, e.g. "/opt/gnucash-unstable/bin/gnucash-cli". |
